title: Bestway BW51009 48 x 10 Inch Ocean Life Kids Paddling Pool, Multi-Coloured
short_description: KIDS PADDLING POOL: make the most of the warm weather with this easy to setup 140L (40 gal) toddler pool 3 INFLATABLE RINGS: made from durable pre-tested vinyl material with a sturdy 3 ring construction EASY SET UP: ideal size even for smaller gardens; 1.22m x 25cm (48" x 10”) simply inflate and fill FUN UNISEX DESIGN: has a detailed fun underwater scene design that kids will love COMPLETE SET: includes paddling pool and repair patch for longer lasting use  See more product details
